articles.description: Vedanta ran covert lobbying campaign to weaken environmental regulations during pandemic. Cairn Oil & Gas lobbied to scrap public hearings for oil exploration projects. Govt amended rules in line with requests from industry, particularly Vedanta. Vedanta shar…
articles.content: Mining and oil giant Vedanta ran a covert lobbying campaign to weaken key environmental regulations during the pandemic, according to a new report by The Organized Crime and Corruption Reporting Proj… [+2605 chars]

articles.title: Crude Oil Weekly Price Forecast – Crude Oil Markets Take Off - FX Empire
articles.description: Crude oil markets have rallied significantly during the course of the week, as it looks like we are going to go much higher.
articles.content: Regardless, it does look like we are going to go looking toward the $90 level where I would expect to see a lot of resistance. Underneath, have the 50-Week EMA near the $79 level that offers support.… [+957 chars]
